name: meShare
0:
”Alexa, show door camera”
”Alexa, show office camera”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
meShare cameras are designed to help you look after your home and family – even when you’re away. Now you can control your meShare camera using Alexa with your Echo Show.

With meShare skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your smart devices by voice.

To get started, select the "Enable Skill" button to link your meShare account and discover your meShare devices.

After connecting Alexa to your meShare Devices in a few simple steps, just say commands like:
• "Alexa, show front door camera"
• "Alexa, show feed from the backyard camera"
• "Alexa, hide backyard camera"

Compatible meShare Cameras:
- meShare 1080p Home Camera
- meShare 1080p Outdoor Camera
- meShare Mini WiFi Cam

Compatible Amazon Alexa Devices:
- Echo Show
